before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"8310h","text":"Pool and dilute primers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4vce","text":"ARTIC 5.3.2 primers can be purchased premixed from IDT (10016495) or custom ordered and mixed per the instructions provided by the Quick lab (https://github.com/quick-lab/SARS-CoV-2/tree/main/400/v5.3.2_400).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":142,"length":64}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":142,"length":64}],"data":{}},{"key":"7k6t8","text":"Make sufficient working stock of each primer mix at (on average) ~150 nM per primer by diluting the stock tubes or mixtures from ~1040 nM. For a full 96-well plate at the ARTIC PCR step, 150 µL of 150 nM working stock of each pool is sufficient.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64gg7","text":"Dilute gRNA","type":"header-two","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecli7","text":"SARS-CoV-2 gRNA (ATCC VR-1986D) is used as a positive control. The positive control sample is 500 copies of the gRNA in 40 µL of water (12.5 copies / µL) added to the plate before the digestion of DNA. Dilute the stock gRNA in water according to the concentration provided by ATCC.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D29F949A32EE11EE9F000A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/quick-lab/SARS-CoV-2/tree/main/400/v5.3.2_400"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4m1n2","text":"This process instruction describes steps for whole genome amplicon sequencing of SARS-CoV-2 from wastewater, including concentration and RNA extraction steps, purification steps, reverse transcription and PCR with ARTIC primers, library construction, and Illumina sequencing. Sequencing data produced using this protocol may be used for a variety of analyses including estimation of variant and mutation abundance. The read lengths are sufficient for read merging and analysis of intact amplicons. This protocol has been used for sequencing activities as part of the WastewaterSCAN program.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ndr4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64nu5","text":"Spin down 50 mL of influent at 5,250 xg for 5 min to clarify the influent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67pig","text":"Add 4.875 mL of influent sample to one well (one well per sample) of a new KingFisher 24 Well Deep Well Plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csl10","text":"Add another 4.875 mL of influent sample to the same well location on a second KingFisher 24 Well Deep Well Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dt3gf","text":"Add 50 µL of Nanotrap Enhancement Reagent 1 (ER1) Solution to each well used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6majt","text":"Add 75 µL of Nanotrap Microbiome A Particles to each well used on the two KingFisher 24 Well Deep Well sample plates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2mihl","text":"Prepare the “Lysis Plate”: Add 350 µL of MagMAX Microbiome Lysis Solution to each well of a new KingFisher 24 Well Deep Well Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lh5l","text":"Run KF-008-WW-Nanotrap-24.bdz on the King Fisher Flex to concentrate the viral particles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8q75k","text":"Once the protocol is completed, the “Lysis Plate” will contain ~350 µL lysate that is ready to proceed to nucleic acid extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fv82c","text":"Transfer 300 µL of lysate to each well of the Chemagic Deepwell Plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5g9ue","text":"Add 300 µL of Lysis Buffer to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dmbgs","text":"Add 10 µL of Proteinase K to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"10jsi","text":"Add 60 µL of Elution Buffer to each well of an Elution Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42vjm","text":"Set up, load, and run the Chemagic for the Viral DNA/RNA 300 Kit H96.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4sf3d","text":"Once the protocol is complete, the nucleic acid (~60 µL) will be in the Elution Plate and ready to proceed to the inhibitor removal steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"141qf","text":"Mount a Zymo Silicon-A-HRC plate (included in kit) onto an Elution Plate (included in kit)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8soa5","text":"Add 150 µL Prep Solution to the wells by piercing the cover foil in the middle with a pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"23nrh","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"81sf3","text":"Centrifuge the plate at 3,500 xg for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ero5","text":"Transfer 60 µL of eluate from the Chemagic Elution Plate into the wells of a prepared Silicon-A-HRC Plate mounted on a new Elution Plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7f6m4","text":"Centrifuge the plate at 3,500 x g for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6l6k3","text":"The cleaned up nucleic acid is now in the Zymo Elution Plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"etfl3","text":"Transfer 40 µL of nucleic acid into a new plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1elcv","text":"To each sample add: 1 µL Turbo DNase and 4 µL 10X Turbo DNase Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ub0n","text":"Incubate:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3c6h9","text":"    Table 1. {"blocks":[{"key":"4rmni","text":"Add 90 µL Kapa HyperPure Beads to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8tpg4","text":"Mix well by pipetting up and down at least 10 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9dsot","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8nui3","text":"Place the plate on a magnet to capture the beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ojj0","text":"Incubate until the liquid is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"47nr7","text":"Carefully remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5omh","text":"Keeping the plate on the magnet, add 200 µL of 80% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cf1c7","text":"Incubate the plate on the magnet at room temperature for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"asors","text":"Carefully remove and discard the ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"n4vb","text":"Keeping the plate on the magnet, add 200 µL of 80% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rv62","text":"Incubate the plate on the magnet at room temperature for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7061c","text":"Carefully remove and discard the ethanol. Try to remove all residual ethanol without disturbing the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96lmr","text":"Dry the beads at room temperature for 3-5 minutes, or until all of the ethanol has evaporated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8dd4f","text":"Remove the plate from the magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"628mi","text":"Resuspend the beads in 13 µL of elution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d59oa","text":"Incubate the plate at room temperature for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8n27b","text":"Place the plate on a magnet to capture the beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a24gs","text":"Incubate until the liquid is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9leem","text":"Transfer the 11 µL of clear supernatant to a new plate for reverse transcription.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b53c","text":"Add 2.75 µL LunaScript RT SuperMix to each well containing RNA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"222v3","text":"Mix well by pipetting up and down at least 10 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ka6k","text":"Add 27.5 µL Kapa HyperPure Beads to each well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1g3mo","text":"Mix well by pipetting up and down at least 10 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"alku0","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5mh9s","text":"Incubate until the liquid is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epd27","text":"Incubate the plate on the magnet at room temperature for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6n8ej","text":"Carefully remove and discard the ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8o1gu","text":"Keeping the plate on the magnet, add 200 µL of 80% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"526hs","text":"Incubate the plate on the magnet at room temperature for 30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8td94","text":"Carefully remove and discard the ethanol. Try to remove all residual ethanol without disturbing the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"552ce","text":"Dry the beads at room temperature for 3-5 minutes, or until all of the ethanol has evaporated.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c3h11","text":"Remove the plate from the magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4jr6f","text":"Resuspend the beads in 12 µL of elution buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ffl3v","text":"Incubate the plate at room temperature for 2 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8sn22","text":"Place the plate on a magnet to capture the beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"avjf3","text":"Incubate until the liquid is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ciuo","text":"Transfer the 5 µL of clear supernatant to two new plates for the two ARTIC PCRs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vake","text":"Make two master mixes, one for ARTIC Pool A and one for ARTIC Pool B. Per sample there should be: 6.25 µL Q5 Hot Start High-Fidelity 2X Master Mix and 1.25 µL of ARTIC PCR primer pool working stock (150 nM).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
